mapper.update: update TTS_SCLTXXCJ_CUSTOMER set USER_ID_CODE = #{userIdCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CUSTOMER_ENTITY_ID_CODE = #{customerEntityIdCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CUSTOMER_USER_ID_CODE = #{customerUserIdCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, IP_ADDRESS = #{ipAddress,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, UPDATEBY = #{updateby,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, UPDATETIME = #{updatetime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, NAME = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, TYPE = #{type,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ORGANIZATION_TYPE = #{organizationType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, LEGAL_REPRESENTATIVE = #{legalRepresentative,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, USER_NAME = #{userName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ID_CARD_NO = #{idCardNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PHONE = #{phone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, EMAIL = #{email,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ADDRESS = #{address,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, STATUS = #{status,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ENTITY_ID_CODE = #{entityIdCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, DELFLAG = #{delFlag,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where ID =#{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: select ID , USER_ID_CODE , CUSTOMER_ENTITY_ID_CODE , CUSTOMER_USER_ID_CODE , IP_ADDRESS , DELFLAG , CREATEBY , UPDATEBY , UPDATETIME , NAME , TYPE , ORGANIZATION_TYPE , LEGAL_REPRESENTATIVE , USER_NAME , ID_CARD_NO , PHONE , EMAIL , ADDRESS , STATUS , CREATETIME , ENTITY_ID_CODE from TTS_SCLTXXCJ_CUSTOMER where ID =#{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
